thread.section_title: Hotel Indigo London Tower Hill - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Hotel Indigo London Tower Hill, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ada1207
title: Great location
text:
A group of four of us wanted to be local to the Tower of London and Fenchurch Street. the location was excellent ,minutes walk from both.
Rooms, whilst not spacious were adequate and styled in a Boutique way.
Free drinks and snacks in the mini bar plus the usual tea /coffee.
Bathroom well appointed with spacious walk in shower.
Everything was spotlessly clean.
Staff were very friendly and helpful, nothing was too much trouble.
Breakfast was excellent value at £12.50 for full a la carte plus anything from the Continental buffet.
Also, tip, the nearby multi storey Minories car park was £2 after 13.30 on Saturday for the rest of the day /night and £2 for the Sunday, in central London, What a deal.
